divs: Sighting DetailsI have been seeing a fairly high altitude object on several occasions for over a month now in the Kerrville area. I was out in my front yard walking my dog when I first noticed it. I was just looking at the night sky as I usually do. It has occurred in various directions but is most noticeable to the northeast. The reason I first noticed it is because of it's unusual flight pattern & how bright it was. It is a cigar shaped (as close as I can tell) brightly lit pulsating with multiple colors. It follows no flight path. It moves in many odd directions & as far as I can tell it just goes upward extremely fast when it disappears. I immediately thought it was A UFO. Others have witnessed it as well. It is not a star as there is no visible star in that position of the sky. My thoughts during the first sighting were "What the hell is that".
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Kerrville
There were no other sightings in Kerrville on or around December 2nd 2012
Summary: Sightings over multiple days. Witnessed by others.
